titles.title: Honoring the dedication and hard work of Professor Eric Reeves on behalf of the people of Sudan.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary:
11/1/2007--Introduced.
Honors the dedication and hard work of Professor Eric Reeves on behalf of the people of Sudan. Reaffirms the House of Representatives' commitment to a just and lasting peace in Sudan.
